resources.string:
Necessary for capturing volume key presses.
No private data is accessed.

I'm an app developer trying to make useful apps, not a thief. You can find my full name and address on google play store.
Actions when idle, meaning nothing really is going on (no media playing, not sound recording, not ringing or in call).\n\nPick actions below:

Actions when currently playing music or other media.

To go to max or min volume when media is playing, you need to triple-click volume key to go the last volume step (more info in Help.)

Pick actions below:
